![](http://i.imgur.com/4C1L7ex.png)  
Hello members of LowEndTalk!  
We are Arcanum Services LLC (US), a web hosting company that aims to provide highly reliable services at affordable rates.  
[You can view our company details here ](http://goo.gl/zp5d2G)  
Today we are announcing our new project [foxvm.com](https://www.foxvm.com)

**Screenshots**

![](http://i.imgur.com/F3NuRNM.png)
![](http://i.imgur.com/Lwn31oh.png)
![](http://i.imgur.com/IVECjU0.png)  
![](http://i.imgur.com/mjFVZzd.png)
![](http://i.imgur.com/kva6avp.png)

**Features**

* Custom support center
* Custom billing system
* Custom control panel

**Offers**


> **[1GB KVM STARTER](https://www.foxvm.com/order.php?id=1)**  
> 
>* 1 vCPU Core
>* 1GB RAM
>* 30GB Storage
>* 100Mbps / 1TB Bandwidth
>* 1 IPv4 + 1 IPv6 Address
>* Location: Dallas/Texas [ Internap datacenter ]
>* Price: $3 / month
>* [Register your account](https://www.foxvm.com/register)

**Addons:**

`Additional IPv4: $1/month `  
`Additional 1TB Bandwidth: $2/month `

1 Week trial is also available if you ask for it via our support center.

If you have any inquiries on our services or about our company, please ask away in the comments section or shoot us an email at support@foxvm.com.

Thank you!
